name: NHL 18: Young Stars Deluxe Edition
summary:
Get the EA SPORTS NHL 18 Young Stars Deluxe Edition now and receive 5850 NHL 18 Points in Hockey Ultimate Team, an Adidas Custom HUT Jersey and the Connor McDavid EASHL Celebration. EA SPORTS NHL 18 delivers the creativity of today's young NHL superstars through new Creative Attack controls and the all-new Defensive Skill Stick. 
 
Play the fast-paced, arcade-inspired 3-on-3 EA SPORTS NHL THREES mode, or reshape the league entirely with the new Expansion Draft and create your own custom 32nd NHL team. Do it all with the most co-op and competitive multiplayer options ever delivered in an EA SPORTS NHL game.
